coup

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • coup.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockAction, ChallengeAction, ExchangeAction, IntransitiveAction, Turn

    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an interface for Invokers to interact with Receivers according to the Command Pattern. The current player is Invoker and Receiver. The current player is changed throughout the lifetime of the Action object, a modification to support the definition of actions at runtime.
